skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Expert in crafting engaging user interfaces and experiences using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks like React.js.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Skilled in building robust server-side applications and APIs using Node.js, Express.js, and database management systems like MongoDB.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: Specializes in designing intuitive and visually appealing interfaces, focusing on user experience principles and interaction design to enhance usability.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: Proficient in creating responsive websites and web applications using Webflow, combining design and development skills to produce high-quality, code-free digital experiences.

portfolio.title: Employee Review System
portfolio.description: A MERN-based employee review system streamlining performance evaluations, enabling managers to conduct assessments, track progress, and provide feedback efficiently.

portfolio.title: Meal Finder
portfolio.description: React-powered meal app with API integration for easy recipe exploration and meal planning, delivering a user-friendly experience for culinary enthusiasts.

portfolio.title: Chat App
portfolio.description: A sleek chat application built with React, Node.js and Socket.io facilitating real-time communication with intuitive design and seamless user experience.
